title: Jenkins is down!
description: Jenkins is down for no apparent reason, delaying all your projects. Only David knows how to fix it.
effect: Move back 1 square every turn. Discard David to remove this effect.

title: Meeting with ITCPD
description: You have to go to another frustrating project meeting.
effect: Throw 2 dice and move back those many squares.

title: Time for marking
description: Your whole team needs to do some urgent marking. Everything else gets delayed.
effect: Move back as many squares as project cards you have.

title: The Architects get involved
description: Brace! Your projects can go very well or very badly.
effect: Discard all your cards and draw 3 new cards. Good luck!

title: It's Agile time!
description: Yeah. Not that kind of Agile. Sorry.
effect: Discard RCI, RC, RDS, RITA, Eva and Clare, if you have them.

title: Raquel
description: Raquel's too busy and can't take any more projects.
effect: Keep this card. Discard all project cards you draw in the future.

title: Roma
description: Roma knows a lot about a lot, and isn't afraid to explain it. Are you sure you've thought that through?
effect: Keep this card. If you would draw a card, roll a die and only draw if you roll 3 or more.

title: Estates
description: Estates have completed a building refit.
effect: Every player randomly swaps places then moves back one space.

title: HR
description: HR get the job description wrong again.
effect: Lose one randomly selected team member.

title: Grace's network glitches
description: There's a sporadic error in Grace's networking infrastructure.
effect: Your jobs fail, go back 3 squares. (Unless you have Research Computing Infrastructure, who save the day.)

title: Corrupt backups
description: Your system backups are corrupted!
effect: Lose a turn sorting out the mess, unless you have Research Computing Infrastructure.

title: Funding confirmed!
description: A grant proposal was successful.
effect: Miss a turn if you have more projects than team members, while you recruit. Otherwise, move +1 per team member card you have.

title: The Fortran Curse
description: You left the cursed Fortran book out of its magic chest overnight, and now the office is flooded.
effect: Lose a turn while you clean up and order new laptops, and lose Jens if you have him.

title: Cold War with Computer Science
description: Projects got allocated to CS guys instead.
effect: Lose half your projects and the team members on CS projects (Asif, Roland and Jonathan if in hand).

title: Loss of crates
description: Some crates mysteriously disappear while moving offices.
effect: Your fancy screens are gone! Productivity is reduced. Move back 2 squares per project in hand.

title: Professor Keeter Bloveney
description: One of your old collaborators demands you go back and fix his code.
effect: Go back 8 squares or lose a team member.

title: The Provost
description: The provost cuts jobs across professional services to pay for his latest vanity project. RITS staff strike in solidarity.
effect: Roll a die and lose that many team members.

title: Strike !
description: UCU calls for pension strike.
effect: Your team members are striking. Projects are delayed. Roll a dice per team member and move back that many squares.

title: Metadata loss
description: Research Data's object store has lost the metadata.
effect: Swap all project cards with a player of your choice.

title: Roland
description: Roland takes a loooooooooooong time to understand the subtleties of perfect software crafting.
effect: He will eventually get there. Reduce your forward moves by 1 for the time spent in explanations.

title: DDoS attack
description: UCLU have cancelled a speaker and as a result UCL are under attack from a botnet.
effect: Miss a turn.

title: GDPR
description: You spend too much time sorting out all GPDR emails.

title: Geekbot is going crazy!
description: You receive random Geekbot notifications.
effect: Have you chosen who will you pair with ? If not, by the end of reading, move to the last player position.

title: Security hole
description: A PI has demanded you implement something in an insecure way as their project is not a target for hackers.
effect: Hold your cards face down in front of the other players, and allow them each to steal one at random.

title: Bad research
description: Someone is running simulations on the cluster, looking for a positive result they can publish.
effect: Roll the dice as many times as it takes to get the number of moves you want, then discard this card.

title: Asif
description: Asif has decided to spend the afternoon hacking his dotfiles.
effect: Lose a turn until he comes to his senses. Discard this card.

title: Anastasis
description: Anastasis is working on projects he knows nothing about, and is distracted with background reading.
effect: Roll a die and move back that many squares. Discard this card.

title: GitHub is being acquired...
description: ... by $ome software company. You are worried about your opensource projects
effect: This event affects everyone! Every player loses two project cards to the player on their right (choose randomly).

title: End of UCL
description: Evil Corp summoned Mecha-Bentham to subjugate UCL. Everything is lost!
effect: All players go back to square 1.

title: Successful recruitment round
description: All newstarters join within the next week.
effect: You may throw the dice again.

title: Good feedback
description: You got some awesome feedback and everyone is motivated.
effect: Move +1 per team member card you have.

title: Clare
effect: You can discard up to three of your cards. Then, discard immediately.

title: David
description: Bouncy and enthusiatic, David knows the magic Jenkins incantations.
effect: Keep this card. Discard to save yourself from the Jenkins Rage card.

title: Matthew
effect: Keep this card. ...

title: Jeremy
description: Jeremy delves into the mysterious world of Electronic Health Records.
effect: Keep this card. +1 if you have the Inform card.

title: Sanaz
description: Sanaz accelerates our data science efforts.
effect: Keep this card. Take an extra turn each time you gain a project requiring data science skills.

title: Roland
description: May the powers of Quantum Mechanics be with you.
effect: Keep this card. Quantum teleportation allows you to probabilistically swap with the leading player on a 5+ dice throw. Move +5 if that's you.

title: Stuart
effect: Keep this card. ...

title: Ilektra
description: Technical *and* socially-minded. Upper management, be afraid.
effect: Keep this card. If you are forced to lose a team member, you may ignore that instruction and discard Ilektra instead.

title: Jonathan
effect: Keep this card. Take an extra turn each time you gain a project if you have more than five.

title: Ben
description: Roaming man of maps, travels in search of sunny climates.
effect: Keep this card. ...

title: Sinan
description: Mysterious man from the east, icon of diversity, fights the mysterious dragon in the haven of data.
effect: Keep this card. Use it at any time allows you to keep any number of your cards when you are forced to discard them.

title: Helen
effect: Keep this card. +1 in all rolls if you also have the Dashboard project.

title: Eva
description: Eva knows all and keeps everything running. She thanks you ever so much.
effect: Keep this card. When you start your turn, you may look at the top three cards of the deck and rearrange them.

title: Josie
description: Because you never know when you'll need more all-around help.
effect: Keep this card. Add +1 to all rolls.

title: Gary
description: You have hired a GPGPU developer.
effect: Keep this card to use later. Move twice the amount shown on the dice (but only if the amount shown on the dice is 4, as GPUs cannot be applied to every problem equally).  Discard after use.

title: Jens
description: Jens is magical. He does a lot of work and can fix any problem, except for The Fortran Curse.
effect: Move forward to square 50. Then, discard immediately.

title: Mayeul
effect: Choose any card from the discard pile and keep it. Then, discard immediately.

title: Research Computing
description: They help you optimise all your software and everything runs so much faster.
effect: Keep this card. Your 6 rolls are now 12's.

title: Research Data
description: Loads of new storage space configured for the team!
effect: Keep this card. There is no limit to the number of cards in your hand.

title: Facilitation
description: They have just found us a few cool new projects to work on!
effect: Draw 3 project cards from the discard pile. Then, discard this card.

title: Research Computing Infrastructure
description: Technical wizards keep computers running.
effect: Keep this card. It allows you to avoid hardware failure events.

title: Budget Surplus
description: You have a budget surplus. Activate "purchase empty server full of gold bars" operational procedure.
effect: Keep this card. It neutralises Loss of crates.

title: ORACC
description: You just won Oracc! Prepare for Sumerian fun and Jython. A lot of Jython.
effect: Keep this card. No other events can make you lose this card.

title: Zacros
description: You just won Zacros! Modern Fortran can be so much fun. Really!
effect: Keep this card. If you get the Fortran curse, it will be amplified, and you'll have to lose 2 rounds instead of 1.

title: Critical Care
description: You just won Critical Care! Explore the rabbit hole of hospital data.
effect: Keep this card. Counts as 3 projects for "Funding confirmed!"

title: CloudLabs
description: CloudLabs just got funded! Azure, ITCPD and ISD Architects, what could go wrong?
effect: Keep this card.

title: Research Software Dashboard
description: Dashboard just got funded! Software might one day be as recognised as papers. Maybe.
effect: Keep this card.

title: ShipViz
description: You just won ShipViz! Ships and maps, Raquel will love this.
effect: Keep this card. Raquel's card has no effect.

title: BICO
description: You just won BICO! Get ready for clear skies and MPI madness.
effect: Keep this card.

title: HHPredY
description: You just won HHPredY! And all of the yeast's secrets shall be revealled.
effect: Keep this card.

title: FASt-Mal
description: You just won FASt-Mal! Will AI be better at diagnosing Malaria than clinicians?
effect: Keep this card. Truce with CS! The Cold War has no effect.

title: HemeLB
description: You just won HemeLB! You're modelling vascular bloodflow, but what about the edge cases?
effect: Keep this card.

title: EPPI Reviewer
description: You just won EPPI Reviewer! Hold on, what's CSLA again? You just lost EPPI Reviewer.
effect: Keep for 2 turns. Then, discard this card.

title: Eyeballs
description: You just won a project with Moorfields Eye Hospital!
effect: Keep this card.

title: BEM++ Science Gateway
description: You just won... err... some project with... someone?
effect: Keep this card... maybe?

title: Web Lab
description: You just won Web Lab! Jonathan gets distracted being a PI.
effect: Keep this card. Jonathan's ability has no effect.
